alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 8:09AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHERN BAYFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 808 AM CDT, an area of heavy snow were along a line extending from 11 miles north of Maple, to near Oulu, and moving east at 45 mph. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Bayfield, Port Wing, Sand Island, Cornucopia, Bayfield Peninsula Sea Caves, Herbster, York Island, Sand Bay, Red Cliff, Madeline Island, Mouth Of Brule, Red Cliff Reservation, and Apostle Islands National Lake Shore. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow passes your location.
